General.Name: Boqii Holding Limited
General.Description: Boqii Holding Limited operates as a pet-focused online retail business in the People's Republic of China. The company offers food, treats, shampoos, cages, toys, apparel, OTC veterinary drugs, and other pet products to pet parents, and small and medium pet businesses through e-commerce platforms and offline distribution network. It also provides cat litter, liners, bath products, dog food, cat food, canned food, pet clothes, and pet toys under the Yiqin brand name; value-for-money pet food under Youbeizi; freeze-dry cat and dog food under the Mocare brand; and pet snacks and supplies, pet pharmaceuticals, and medical care products under the D-cat brand name. In addition, the company operates Boqii Mall, an online sales platform; and Boqii Community, an interactive content platform. It also provides pet products to offline pet stores and hospitals; and online marketing and information services. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
